Braun: Pokazali smo da umemo da se grupišemo i kada je teško
Američki košarkaš tvrdi da je cilj bio zaustaviti Šveda

01 Nov 2019

Odlično su košarkaši Crvene zvezde sinoć odigrali u Evroligi. Na domaćem parketu u Pioniru, Himki gotovo da nije imao šanse, pa je na kraju i prilično ubedljivo poražen, što mu je tek drugi neuspeh ove sezone u Evroligi. Jedan od boljih pojedianaca u timu Zvezde bio je Lorenzo Braun. On ističe da je jedan od ključeva pobede bio čvrsta igra u odbrani."Igrali smo čvrsto. Drago mi je da se naša igra večeras svela na odličnu odbranu. Uradili smo dobar posao sa Švedom večeras i to nam je bio glavni cilj”, rekao je Braun.
Potom se osvrnuo i na način na koji je Zvezda branila Alekseja Šveda.“Da, to je definitivno bio jedan od glavnih razloga. Znali smo da dosta voli da razigrava visoke igrače, pa smo dodatno suzili reket, što je takođe bio jedan od glavnih ciljeva”.
Kaže da je isključenje Branka Lazića dodatno pomoglo ekipi da se zbije i da pokaže da ume da odigra kvalitetno i kada se desi nešto nepredviđeno.“Dešava se. On je ipak naš kapiten. Nakon što je isključen, morali smo da se grupišemo i pokazali smo da možemo to da uradimo”.
Pobeda će značiti Zvezdi na polju samopouzdanja nakon teškog perioda.“Počeli smo meč sa nekoliko dobrih odbrana i takva je bila situacija. Trenutno mnogo sve ovo znači. Želimo da se zbijemo zajedno kao tim. I da nastavimo da grizemo dalje”.
Braun je uporedio Evroligu sa ranijim periodom u karijeri. Kaže da ga sve podseća na koledž košarku.“U Evroligi je dosta drugačije. Sve me podseća na koledž košarku, ali sa kvalitetnijim igračima. Igraće se dosta jače fizički. Navijači su prilično slični, mada su dosta življi. Trebalo mi je malo vremena da se prilagodim, ali zahvalan sam saigračima što su mi olakšali put do adaptacije. Košarka je košarka, ali opet tu ima nekih sitnica kao što su različita pravila”.
Za kraj, imao je poruku i za navijače.“Oni su neverovatni. Uvek dođu u tolikom broju i rade ono što najbolje rade, tako da na sve to moraš da odreaguješ pozitivno. Navijači, hvala najlepše. Zaista cenimo podršku”, zaključio je američki košarkaš.

Brown: We've shown that we can group together when it's difficult
American basketball claims that the goal was to stop the Swede

01 Nov 2019

The Red Star basketball team played great in the Euroleague last night. At home parquet in Pionir, Khimki had almost no chance, so he was quite convincingly defeated in the end, which is his second failure this season in the Euroleague. One of the better individuals on the Star team was Lorenzo Brown. He points out that one of the keys to the win was solid defense. "We played tight. I'm glad our game tonight came down to great defense. We did a good job with Sweden tonight and that was our main goal," he said. Brown.
He then commented on the way Star defended Alexei Swed. "Yes, that was definitely one of the main reasons. We knew he loved playing high players, so we narrowed down the racket, which was also one of our main goals. "
He says Branko Lazic's exclusion has further helped the team to tighten up and show that he can play well when something unforeseen happens. "It happens. He is our captain after all. After it was shut down, we had to group together and we showed that we could do it. "
Victory will mean a star in the field of confidence after a difficult period. ”We started the match with some good defenses and that was the situation. At the moment, all this means. We want to get together as a team. And let's continue to bite further. "
Brown compared the Euroleague to an earlier career period. He says it all reminds him of college basketball. ”The Euroleague is very different. It all reminds me of college basketball, but with better quality players. It will play much stronger physically. The fans are quite similar, though they are much livelier. It took me a while to adjust, but I am grateful to my teammates for making it easy for me to adapt. Basketball is basketball, but again there are some little things, such as different rules. "
In the end, he had a message for the fans. ”They are amazing. They always come in so many and do what they do best, so you have to respond positively to it all. Fans, thank you very much. We really appreciate the support, ”the American basketball player concluded.
